alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 12:19PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lake and central Volusia Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1219 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near DeLeon Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daytona Beach, DeLand, DeLeon Springs, Barberville and DeLand Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
